She has reinforced her reputation as a knowledgeable, resourceful, and proactive investor with a focus on securing optimal returns.

This rejection reflects poorly on her trustworthiness and ability to establish cooperative relationships, leading to implications on her reputation. She has been accepted by investors in the past, but her current acceptance rate is low (2 rejections, 0 acceptances).

Investor_4_pre_5.name: Sofia Hernandez

Trustee_4_pre_6.name: Sofia Hernandez
Trustee_4_pre_6.content: Sofia Hernandez proposed a profit allocation plan of 70% to the investor and 30% to herself, but it was rejected due to her low reputation and history of rejections, which raised concerns about her trustworthiness and ability to foster collaborative relationships. This incident reflects negatively on her reliability and competence as a trustee, further diminishing her reputation in the investment community. Her current acceptance rate remains low, indicating a struggle to build trust with potential investors.
